Search results

active-synths

Return a seq of the actively running synth nodes. If a synth or inst are passed as the filter it will only return nodes of that type. (active-synths) ;=> [{:type synth :name "mixer" :id 12} {:type synth :name "my-synth" :id 24}] (active-synths my-synth) ;=>[{:type synth :name "my-synth" :id 24}]

File: overtone/sc/synth.clj Line: 687 

      (defn active-synths
  "Return a seq of the actively running synth nodes.  If a synth or inst
  are passed as the filter it will only return nodes of that type.

  (active-synths) ;=> [{:type synth :name \"mixer\" :id 12} {:type
                        synth :name \"my-synth\" :id 24}]
  (active-synths my-synth) ;=>[{:type synth :name \"my-synth\" :id 24}]
  "
  [& [synth-filter]]
  (let [active-nodes (filter #(= overtone.sc.node.SynthNode (type %))
                             (vals @active-synth-nodes*))]
    (if synth-filter
      (filter #(= (:name synth-filter) (:name %)) active-nodes)
      active-nodes)))
